name: jasmine-spec-reporter
description: Spec reporter for jasmine behavior-driven development framework

scripts.pretest: npm run tsc && npm run testc
scripts.lint: node node_modules/tslint/bin/tslint -c tslint.json 'src/**/*.ts' && node node_modules/tslint/bin/tslint -c tslint.json 'spec/**/*.ts'
scripts.coverage: npm run pretest && rm -rf coverage && node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js && npm run remap-coverage
scripts.remap-coverage: ./node_modules/.bin/remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/lcov-ts.info -t lcovonly && ./node_modules/.bin/remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/html-report -t html

author: Bastien Caudan
